programme.title: Go! Grand Canal Ep2
programme.desc: The Grand Canal, a world heritage site, will be explored from various perspectives, including history, politics, culture, and economics, highlighting its spiritual values and contributions to Chinese nation's history and culture.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 4 (Repackaged) Ep9
programme.desc: The show has served as a bridge that connects veteran and young singers via various popular songs. Priscilla Chan, Yang Kun, Steve Chou, Qi Zhang, Jam Hsiao, An Youqi, Lu Hu, Hui Yuan Meng, Ma Jiaqi, etc. are invited for the pairing section. They all raised audiences interest by introducing unexpected changes to the way music that performed.

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep10
programme.desc: With a one-day time limit, male and female guests gather in three everyday life scenes to connect with and understand each other. Breaking the typical dating show format, host Zhang Chunye and the ""Support Team"" (Jam Hsiao, Dazhang Wei, Pu Yixing, Cai Guoqing, and Wang Yaoqing) witness the growing emotions between guests, accompanying them through the sweetness and setbacks of their emotional journey.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 5 Ep12
programme.desc: This season is upgraded with a new celebrity selection while the celebrities will reveal their experience and love stories by instantly answering questions. The show aims to interpret young peoples views on marriage and love with the collisions between celebrities and audience, and among different generations.

programme.title: Bond of Friendship Ep6
programme.desc: The documentary series consists of six chapters that represent China's history of openness through the Canton Fair.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 4 (Repackaged) Ep9
programme.desc: The show has served as a bridge that connects veteran and young singers via various popular songs. Priscilla Chan, Yang Kun, Steve Chou, Qi Zhang, Jam Hsiao, An Youqi, Lu Hu, Hui Yuan Meng, Ma Jiaqi, etc. are invited for the pairing section. They all raised audiences interest by introducing unexpected changes to the way music that performed.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep4
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep34
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Talk With Famous Doctors Ep30
programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep12
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: Go! The Little Knights Ep9
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep20
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep22
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep217
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep5040
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night M Ep1982
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in crosstalk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep3950
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep3777
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Hot Door Night M Ep2294
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in crosstalk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep3952
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go M Ep3075
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stylish ManThe Chef M Ep3952
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa T Ep259
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life.This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easytounderstand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night M Ep2295
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in crosstalk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep220
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep3778
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Better Days
programme.desc: In this Oscar nominee for Best International Feature Film, Nian faces relentless bullying from her peers as she prepares for her college entrance exam. Fate leads her to streetwise punk Bei, but before they can retreat into their own world, both are embroiled in a murder investigation that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husbands love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her fathers death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late fathers hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: New Tales of the Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep15
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Accused S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Eugene's Story - Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

She heads off the beaten track to explore the state's rich history and meet the incredible people who live in the Alaskan wilderness, to discover if she too could survive in its beautiful backcountry.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep3

programme.desc: Venezuela - Robson Green heads to Venezuela to catch three kinds of billfish, before meeting a 20-ton whale shark.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep12
programme.desc: Sri Lanka - Ben stays with Naveen and Anke who have made their home in the Sri Lanka's highlands. He uncovers why they swapped one of the biggest cities in the world for a simple off-grid existence miles from civilisation.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Uncle Matheson - Robson and his Uncle Matheson head to the Lake District. They try ghyll scrambling near Honister and spend a night in a Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Kevin Whately - Robson heads to Northumberland to meet his acting hero, Kevin Whately. The pair have a go at sand art, go to sea in a rowing boat and test their musical skills on the border pipes.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Feel the burn at a state-of-the-art gym that used to be a psychiatric hospital and see a climbing complex that once was a sugar refinery.

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Ravi The Baby Lion Tailed Macaque - Explore the verdant rainforest of the Western Ghats in southern India, where an endangered baby lion-tailed macaque will need to learn the laws of the jungle to survive food shortages, a shrinking habitat, and hungry predators.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep S1 Ep1
programme.desc: How The Wild Things Sleep - There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behaviour. But why bother with sleep at all? programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Summer to Remember - Dive into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. Shadow the team as they fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and see vet Karina use a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter Is Coming - Uncover the fascinating strategies insects use to survive through the coldest days of winter. In brilliant colour and slow motion, see ladybugs gather to stave off freezing and earwigs mercilessly defend their underground breeding chambers.

programme.title: Boss Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Shark - Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meadow Of Horror - Enter a rarely seen world of insect terror, where brutal death, vicious fights, and last-minute rescues abound. In this ordinary setting, discover enemies and murderers, friendly encounters, and a little romance.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys, and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundredseven thousandsof individuals.

programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with natures cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poachers snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Meet the most successful order of animals on the planet through close-up, slow-motion shots. Discover the hidden yet fascinating behaviour of domestic beetles, which have inhabited the earth for more than 240 million years.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, its their last day at forest school.

programme.desc: From The Mountains To The Beaches On Maui - Young parents living on Maui are trading rainy weather for sunny beaches. They are ready to downsize to a condo as close to the beach as possible.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep10
programme.desc: Feeling Centered On Maui - A free-spirited nurse from San Francisco is ready to make Maui her home. She can't wait to spend her time surfing and doing yoga on the beach.

programme.title: Mysteries Of The Deep S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Secrets Of Russias Nuclear Sub - Jeremy investigates an accident involving a nuclear submarine on a secret mission.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: After The Hunt S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ufos Over England: After The Hunt - Josh Gates, his crew and UFO expert James Fox offer behind-the-scenes insights into a mass UFO sighting in Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Border Control: Europe S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Inside Investigation - In Rome, a couple is sent to the hospital after smuggling drugs inside their bodies, in Frankfurt, Germany, a passenger is found carrying many undeclared phones.

programme.title: Border Control: Europe S1 Ep4
programme.desc: A Slippery Situation - In Algeciras, Spain, a clandestine eel hatchery is dismantled, and in Brussels, whitening creams containing illegal, carcinogenic ingredients are confiscated.

programme.title: Legendary Locations S1 Ep11
programme.desc: If Walls Could Talk - Josh Gates explores other great walls in India, England and Taiwan.

programme.title: Legendary Locations S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Pirat Paradise - Josh Gates explores places where unusual heroes rule the day in Madagascar, India and Mexico.

programme.title: Fright Club S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ghost Streakers - Jack and the Ghost Brothers tackle a phantom football fan. Plus, special guest Montel Williams lends his signature real talk to couples affected by hauntings.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep11
programme.desc: Trading Toronto Winters For Oahu Vistas - Toronto newlyweds want to move to their honeymoon paradise of Oahu. Theyre looking for a home with space for a home office and with a large veranda.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep12
programme.desc: Graduating To The Real World On Oahu - A recent college graduate is starting her military career on Oahu. She's excited to explore the different areas of the island and paddleboard in her free time.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: After The Hunt S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Roswell Revealed: After The Hunt - Josh Gates, his crew and UFO expert James Fox discuss their travels, research and stunning new revelations in the most famous UFO case of all time -- Roswell.

programme.title: Border Control: Europe S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Suspicious Gifts - A traveler arrives in Rome with his luggage full of knock-off luxury products, and a dog in Brussels detects drugs on a passenger, but authorities can't find them.

programme.title: Border Control: Europe S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Land And Sea - The Customs Police pull out all the stops on a renegade car at the French-Belgian border, the Financial Guard in Italy confront a traveler about her suspicious suitcase.

programme.title: The Dead Files S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Triggered Flint Michigan - Steve and Amy investigate paranormal activity harassing a young family in Flint, Michigan.

programme.desc: Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep, dance, repeat! Eat, sleep...you get the idea! These are your essential dance hits to get you through the day!

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because we're bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: Kings of Leon: I Want My MTV
programme.desc: Kings of Leon visit MTV HQ to talk about the music videos that have made them into the successful artist they are today! What was the first video they ever saw and who's their biggest inspiration?

programme.title: Måneskin: MTV Rocks Special
programme.desc: Jack Saunders welcomes rockers Mneskin to MTV HQ to talk about their rise to fame, their string of hit singles, playing live, fashion and everything in between!

programme.title: MTV Unplugged Presents: Twenty...
programme.desc: ... One Pilots. In this latest edition of the iconic MTV Unplugged series, Twenty One Pilots take the stage to perform stripped-back versions of some of their biggest songs.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him he just had to be there, but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep16
programme.desc: Fast Franks Fixit / Tail-Kwondo - When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep36
programme.desc: The Pangea-ing - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep32
programme.desc: Turboldy Go Part 1/Part 2 - A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space; The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris ... and a fiery re-entry.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep31
programme.desc: Slamtools - Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep31
programme.desc: Toddle-Lu, Mexico City - Odlulu wants her own quinceaera, a traditional Mexican celebration for a girl's 15th birthday, so she uses the Grow-Up Key to skip ahead a few years. But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, and Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep17
programme.desc: Berry Race / The Artist - The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep13
programme.desc: Crimson And Clover - Clover's wild, party-girl twin sister Crimson visits and King Julien is instantly smitten.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep63
programme.desc: Untitled Templeton Project - Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep13
programme.desc: Star - Dulcinea finds a wishing star and decides to use it to help San Lorenzo, but all of her wishes wind up in chaos.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep25
programme.desc: Memory Spark / Wondertusk - Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep26
programme.desc: Clamshell Day - Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep26
programme.desc: Game of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep25
programme.desc: The Pawston Chewbilee / Dont Go, Cat. Go! - Based on PD Eastman's classic childrens book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scoochs easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tags high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, shes often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Dog, Snow! - When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep33
programme.desc: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind - When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep7
programme.desc: How to Pick Your Dragon - Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Portrait of Hiccup as a Buff Man - Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Dragon Flower - After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep71
programme.desc: Federal Slumber Party - Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep39
programme.desc: The Last Dumont - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Pups Save an Out of Control Mini Patrol - Alex and his Mini-Patrol accidentally take off on Daring Danny's rocket bike!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that Gertrude is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Ruby Tart - On Ruby Day, Chef always celebrates the same traditions, including making a Ruby Tart. But this year, everything goes wrong.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Toy Trouble! - The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Greg of the Wild / The Legend of the Library Hamster - The hamsters think a scout badge has magically turned Greg into a baby bear. // The hamsters meet a local urban legend- DeeDee, "The Library Hamster".

programme.desc: Pups Save a Baby Caribou / Pups Save Luke and His Luke-Alike - When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside. It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite him with his family. / When Luke Stars gets blown away in a giant tumbleweed, Digi and Tal make a duplicate which dances out of control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1018
programme.desc: Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder / Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex - When Cap'n Turbot's ship disappears, the Paw Patrol must venture into the mysterious Adventure Bay Triangle to find the missing vessel. // When Alex and Mr. Porter swap roles, the pups must help track down the Mini-Patrol after they go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now its up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Reuse-It Station / The Crew Builds A Duck Bridge - When Speed Meister builds his own station for reusing trash, the pups have to clean up the mess all over Builder Cove. // After a baby duckling follows them home, Rubble & Crew use their construction know-how to bring the duckling back to its home.

programme.desc: Asparagus - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's young Asparagus sharing his deep affection to wet weather in the song "I Love The Rain".

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Hiccup Havoc - Supertato gets hiccups while Evil Pea is firing jam at Tato Tower. Supertato harnesses the power of his hiccups to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's jam attack.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Dino Danger - A toy dinosaur rampages in the Supermarket and scares the Grape Kids. Carrot and Supertato work out that it's controlled by a remote control and get the dinosaur back in its box.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Trailer - When it's time for the Tubby Custard Ride, there's a special trailer the Teletubbies haven't seen before. It's for The Noo-Noo who gets to go on a special Tubby Custard Ride.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep12
programme.desc: L - Dee encourages a friend to say 'l', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet some lovely lambs, use our legs and see a ladybird with a lollipop!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Zip's Magnificent Memory Book - The friends go to the waterfall to see a rainbow.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Messy Antics - During Mayor Oki's birthday picnic, Messy and friends get in trouble with Zam's shrinkasizer! Time to solve these OKIDO antics!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Magic - Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Chest - Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - The Squirrels spot the strangest things in a rock pool - wriggling dots with tails.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the Squirrels want to play outside. What can they do?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Tepui Mountains, Venezuela - Xuli and Glitch need rescuing from a sinkhole.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tower Bridge, London - Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Seesaw - Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Andy and the Piraputanga - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Amazon rainforest on a global adventure to discover how piraputanga fish feed on berries above the water's surface.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Grasses - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how grasses play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep2
programme.desc: Rhyming Lurgy - In this episode the new pirates Sandy and Seaweed have caught the rhyming lurgy of the Ancient Mariner and can only speak in rhyme!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep2

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep10

programme.desc: Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Lunch With Masters Of Finance Ep3
programme.desc: Man Of Megatrends [English Subtitles] - Since the 1980's, serial investor and entrepreneur Jayesh Parekh has repeatedly capitalised on some of the biggest trends in Asia. Today, he's onto a new trend which he believes will last decades.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent Ep37
programme.desc: Shanghai's Expat Exodus - Shanghai suffered during the Covid lockdowns. Two years since it reopened, the part of the expat community it lost never really returned. Are Shanghai's heydays as a cosmopolitan global hub behind it?

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: Rewilding Sharks Ep1
programme.desc: The series will follow the efforts of the Raja Ampat community over the next one year as they attempt to bring back a keystone species that disappeared from the ecosystem zebra sharks.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Young And Rural In China Ep1
programme.desc: Part 1 - Digital nomad enclaves in China's rural heartlands are attracting young professionals from across the country.Chinese youths are also giving up prestigious big-city jobs to become new farmers and rural influencers.Discover why attitudes towards rural living have been changing in China.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: Untold Legends Ep1
programme.desc: Vickie Dutton - A filmmaker discovers a forgotten fashion powerhouse, whose designs in her monthly magazine columns inspired many in the 1960s, and finds an extraordinary life hidden behind the pages of glamour.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Daughters Of Putien

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 20, Day 9 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, Watanabe Kazuyo has worked to improve childhood cancer survival rates in Vietnam and other Asian countries. She was even awarded honorary citizenship by a Vietnamese province.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: Actor Robin Barde heads to Gujo Hachiman, which is famous for its castle, pristine spring water, and bon dancing, which spans 30 days. Barde immerses himself in this wondrous world.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
